actions-list.actionItem: The House adjourned pursuant to a previous special order. The next meeting is scheduled for 11:00 a.m. on May 2, 2023.
On motion to adjourn Agreed to by voice vote.
Mr. Grothman moved that the House do now adjourn.
The House has concluded all anticipated legislative business and has proceeded to Special Order speeches.
Pursuant to section 3(z) of H. Res. 5, the Chair announced the Speaker's designation of the period from Saturday, April 29, 2023, through Monday, May 8, 2023, as a "district work period."
Mrs. Kim (CA) asked unanimous consent That when the House adjourns on Friday, April 28, 2023, it adjourn to meet at 11:00 a.m. on Tuesday, May 2, 2023. Agreed to without objection.
The House proceeded with further one minute speeches.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

actions-list.header: On passage Passed by the Yeas and Nays: 221

actions-list.actionItem: The previous question was ordered pursuant to the rule.
The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H.J. Res. 39.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 2811 and H.J. Res. 39. Resolution provides for two hours of general debate on H.R. 2811 and one hour of general debate on H.J. Res. 39. The previous question is considered as ordered with one motion to recommit allowed on each measure.

Considered under the provisions of rule H. Res. 327. H.J. Res. 39 â€” "Disapproving the rule submitted by the Department of Commerce relating to "Procedures Covering Suspension of Liquidation, Duties and Estimated Duties in Accord With Presidential Proclamation 10414"."
The House proceeded with one minute speeches, which by direction of the Chair, would be limited to 5 per side of the aisle.
The Chair designated Mr. Espaillat to lead the Members in reciting the Pledge of Allegiance to the Flag.
The Speaker announced approval of the Journal.  Pursuant to clause 1, rule I, the Journal stands approved.
Today's prayer was offered by Pastor Greg Shipe, First Baptist Church, Bellefonte, PA.
The House convened, starting a new legislative day.
